creator: Legend Games Hong Kong Limited
descriptionHtml:
The gang that used to be loyal to you has now abandoned you, the brothers who were born and died are now in their own hands, the city you once took your life has fallen into the hands of the enemy, and during the five years you were framed and imprisoned, everything was Right and wrong. In the eyes of others, you are already a nobody, and now you have returned, the city is eager for a new ruler, gather your former subordinates, take back everything that belongs to you, and become a legend of the underworld!

☆Dominate the block ☆
"I'll have the final say after this block!"
Build your gang territory on the violent streets of criminals, wrestle their blocks from your enemies, take over all kinds of industries, control all resources, and become the talker of the city!

☆Underworld Hero☆
"Criminal villain? Exactly what we need!"
There are ruthless people from all walks of life in the bar. For us, they are all potential talents, underground thugs, road fighters, and ruthless gunmen. Tame these beasts and let them work for you, become your right-hand man on the road of your black gold empire, and open up the frontier for you. Tutu!

☆Vice City☆
"Wealth is for the powerful"
Our black gold empire only has one city. If you are content with the status quo, you will only be trampled by others, speak with strength, plunder resources from other players to occupy the city, participate in multi-person gang melee, and witness the rise of black gold empires!

☆Family power☆
"Don't mess with me, you can't imagine the consequences!"
As the leader, you can create your own gang, invite like-minded people to join, develop forces together, and fight against rival gangs from different regions. The rules are written by you, and you need to let them know who is the ruler!

☆Beautiful companions☆
"Beautiful car beauty, I want it all!"
Get to know beauties from different countries and regions, and you will provide shelter for them as a gangster; you can date them in private clubs after every day after the bullets, enjoy a private two-person world, and let them fall for your charm in your own way!

-------Information-------
Discord: https://discord.gg/rEhdSYQRWD
descriptionShort: Fight against gangsters, build black gold empire and become a legend!

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Optimizations:
- Reduced research time for the first 3 Economy Tech and first 4 Military Tech.
- Prestige Mall: Hero, Walong, can be purchased from Stage 3-10 (instead of 4-10), and the price is reduced from 1,500 to 1,000 Prestige Coins.
Fixes:
- Fixed the display of Intel icons on certain Resource Points.
- Fixed a bug where the scene doesn't change after tapping on a target in the Rally.
- Fixed a bug where Ladies' Active Skills are shown as ready when they are unavailable.

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- New event: Wild Bash
- Cadre: Players can create 1 Cadre to join Rallies against Thugs automatically.
- Stronghold search: Locates all Strongholds within the Villa's radius.
- Damage Aid: When the Villa is under attack, compensation in the form of resources and Speed-Ups will be awarded based on the total DMG taken.
- Chapter 1 of Don's Path is now available.
- The interface for Armies is now accessible by tapping on the button in the main interface.

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- USD0 Purchase Event, available after Villa Lv 7
- Clean Sweep operation, available after Villa Lv 10
- Battle of the Poison Lord, available after Villa Lv 15

Optimizations:
- New looting gameplay in the City
- Ladies' Active Skills can now be upgraded
- Optimized display of Ladies' unlock requirements
- Added Neutral Properties and the Underground King storyline

rated.label: Teen

title: Mafia King

container.value: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong

creator: Legend Games Hong Kong Limited
descriptionHtml:
-------Information-------
Discord: https://discord.gg/rEhdSYQRWD

The gangs that were once loyal to you turned their backs. Those who called themselves your "brothers" harbor ill will. The city you sacrificed everything for is now in the hands of your enemy. You were framed, and everything changed in those five years that you were away in prison. Now that you have returned, the city is eager for a new leader. You summon former friends to fight by your side. You are ready to take back what's yours!

- Take Charge
"I'm in charge of this neighborhood from now on!"
Form your gang on the violent streets, where criminals roam. Rip the carpet out from under your enemies' feet, and take over their properties and resources. This city is yours!

- Cosa Nostra
"Need a job? We're short of some good men."
People from all walks of life frequent the bar and are potential talents you can recruit. Underground fighters, hot-blooded bikers, and impassive gunmen make great additions to your ever-growing gang. Make these outlaws loyal to you, and grow your family!

- Sin City
"Wealth is for those in power."
Why stop at one city when you can extend your reach to others? Plunder resources from other gangs and cities to bolster your own. Show who's the real boss in town by defeating the others in gang wars. Put those naive ruffians in their place!

- Family Power
"Don't piss me off. You won't like it."
Join or form Clans and forge beneficial alliances with other gangs! Help each other out and expand your territories. Fend off rival gangs, and show the underworld who's the real boss around here!

- Hot Babes
"Enjoy fast cars and hot babes!"
Meet beautiful women from different regions and provide them shelter. Bring them on romantic dates in private clubs and enjoy your night. Use your charms to make these women fall for you!
descriptionShort: Fight against gangsters, build black gold empire and become a legend!

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New content:
- Recharge gift event, now player will receive points after purchasing gift packs.

Optimization:
- During the Purge Event, add a server-wide announcement for first time breakthrough.
- In the Purge Event, medal and avatar frame rewards will be added for the first pass of levels 14 and 15.
- When players first defeat an elite level in the BOSS SHOWDOWN event, players who have not reached the progress can also receive celebration rewards.

Bug fixes:
- Fixed some bugs.

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's new:
Event :Battle for the Metropolis
- Registration time:
Event will open every 2 weeks, first sign-up time: 24th, Aug
- Alliance participation requirement:
· The top 30 players in the alliance power list of this server, and the members of the alliance r4 or above can form a team and sign up.
· Form a team with more than 15 members
· The minimum might of participating teams is above 100,000,000
- Individual participation requirement:
·Villas above Lv.16

title: Mafia King

container.value: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong

creator: Games Hub Hong Kong Limited
descriptionHtml:
-------Information-------
Discord: https://discord.gg/rEhdSYQRWD

The gangs that were once loyal to you turned their backs. Those who called themselves your "brothers" harbor ill will. The city you sacrificed everything for is now in the hands of your enemy. You were framed, and everything changed in those five years that you were away in prison. Now that you have returned, the city is eager for a new leader. You summon former friends to fight by your side. You are ready to take back what's yours!

- Take Charge
"I'm in charge of this neighborhood from now on!"
Form your gang on the violent streets, where criminals roam. Rip the carpet out from under your enemies' feet, and take over their properties and resources. This city is yours!

- Cosa Nostra
"Need a job? We're short of some good men."
People from all walks of life frequent the bar and are potential talents you can recruit. Underground fighters, hot-blooded bikers, and impassive gunmen make great additions to your ever-growing gang. Make these outlaws loyal to you, and grow your family!

- Sin City
"Wealth is for those in power."
Why stop at one city when you can extend your reach to others? Plunder resources from other gangs and cities to bolster your own. Show who's the real boss in town by defeating the others in gang wars. Put those naive ruffians in their place!

- Family Power
"Don't piss me off. You won't like it."
Join or form Clans and forge beneficial alliances with other gangs! Help each other out and expand your territories. Fend off rival gangs, and show the underworld who's the real boss around here!

- Hot Babes
"Enjoy fast cars and hot babes!"
Meet beautiful women from different regions and provide them shelter. Bring them on romantic dates in private clubs and enjoy your night. Use your charms to make these women fall for you!
descriptionShort: Fight against gangsters, build black gold empire and become a legend!

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- Desperate Straits Available Now: Participate with your Capos and fight for fabulous rewards.
- Public Enemy Available Now: Complete the specified tasks for tons of special rewards.
- Underworld King Available Now: Occupy the Aureate Empire located in the center of the map, and help your Alliance Leader become the Underworld King. The Underworld King can assign player titles, designate them as sinners, and send messages to the entire server.

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New:
- Chicago Legends themed series of activities are now available
Event Period:lasts for 7 days, rewards can be redeemed for 9 days
Participation Requirement: Villa level 7 or above
Join at: Chicago Legends activity entrance on the main interface
The event consists of 4 parts:
·The Godfather's Collection
·Memorial Statue
·Bloodbath
·Life or Death Express
Complete these events and get your rewards!
-The level cap for all ladies has been expanded to level 60.

title:
Mafia King
1.11.0

container.value: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong

creator: Games Hub Hong Kong Limited
descriptionHtml:
Looking for an exciting strategy game? Enter the world of Mafia King, a real-time global online mafia-themed war game! Experience a world where the gangs that were once loyal to you have turned their backs. Those who once called themselves your "brothers" now harbor ill will. The city you sacrificed everything for is now under the control of your enemies. You were framed, and everything has changed during the five years you spent in prison. Now that you have returned, the mafia city is in need of a new mafia Boss. Rally your former friends to fight alongside you and reclaim what is rightfully yours in this thrilling new mafia game!

Game Features

- Take Charge
"I'm in charge of this neighborhood from now on!"
Form your gang in the violent streets where criminals roam. Disrupt your enemies' plans, seize their properties and resources, and establish your dominance over the city. This city belongs to you!

- Cosa Nostra
"Need a job? We're short of some good men."
Turf wars are won through strength! The bar attracts gangsters from diverse backgrounds who could become valuable recruits. Skilled underground fighters, passionate bikers, and stoic gunmen make excellent additions to your expanding gang. Take control of the mafia war and grow your family!

- Sin City
"Wealth is for those in power."
Why settle for just one mafia city when you can expand your influence to others? Like in many strategy games, you must plunder resources from other cities to strengthen your own. Show the gangsters who's the true boss by defeating rival gangs in turf wars. Put those naive ruffians in their place!

- Family Power
"Don't piss me off. You won't like it."
Join or form Clans and form beneficial alliances with other gangs! Support each other and expand your territories. Engage in various Faction Events. Fend off rival gangs and show the underworld who's the real boss in one of the most intense turf war games!

- Hot Babes
"Enjoy luxury cars and hot babes!"
Meet beautiful women from different regions and provide them with shelter. Take them on romantic dates to exclusive clubs and enjoy unforgettable evenings together. Use your charisma to make these women fall for you, the esteemed mafia boss! Collect car parts and assemble the most exclusive luxury cars to enhance your power and emerge victorious in this war!

-------Information-------
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameMafiaKing
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/rEhdSYQRWD
Customer Support: help.mafiaking.android@gameshub-online.com
descriptionShort: Time to build your mafia empire, and become the legendary mafia boss!

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The July update will add the following content and features to the game:
- New Maps: Outer Selos City
- Brand new Selos City management simulation mode
- "Boxing Gym" mode
- "Underground Arena" mode
- "Smuggling Storm" mode
We will reveal more details about these new game modes in the subsequent announcements! Expect to have lots more fun and challenges from all the new content coming your way.

appDetails.developerAddress: 40th Floor, Dah Sing Financial Centre,No. 248 Queen’s Road East,Wanchai,Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed an issue where the coordinates of the warning interface would jump in the Battle for Metropolis, causing the main interface UI to be lost.
- Resolved the issue that allowed the intelligence mission—Alliance Help mission to be triggered during the Battle for Metropolis.
- Fixed a problem where obtaining villa skin props while the villa is under construction would prevent login.
